enabled.title: Deploy Kafka in the data platform cluster
enabled.description: Whether to deploy a kafka as part of data platform. Switch this off in case kafka is not needed

enabled.title: Deploy Spark in the data platform cluster
enabled.description: Whether to deploy a Spark as part of data platform. Switch this off in case Spark is not needed

enabled.title: Deploy Solr in the data platform cluster
enabled.description: Whether to deploy a Solr as part of data platform. Switch this off in case Solr is not needed

enabled.title: Deploy Wavefront observability for the data platform cluster including configuration for metrics exporters for all the components
enabled.description: Whether to deploy a Wavefront observability as part of data platform. Switch this off in case Wavefront is not needed

clusterName.title: Provide the kubernetes cluster name to be configured in wavefront
clusterName.description: Kubernetes cluster name to be configured in wavefront, if not provided it will be defaulted to KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_NAME

url.title: Provide the wavefront cluster url to be configured
url.description: Wavefront cluster url to be configured to export the metrics to

token.title: Provide the wavefront user API token to be used for the cluster url provided above
token.description: Wavefront user API token to be used for the cluster url provided above
